Reviews.Title: Excellent.  All the kit OK.
Reviews.Author: Roberto D. Pulenta
Reviews.Content: All very good and as spectated.  There was a charge of freight that I not spectated but it was worth paying for it.

Reviews.Title: So easy to use! Love the total package thing so I didn't have to worry that I forgot something I needed.
Reviews.Author: Jeannine Jones
Reviews.Content: I love the total package.  I recommend charging both batteries, just in case.  I think the case is a bit odd shaped to hold all that you need but just had to move things around instead of keeping everything together.  Really easy to use.  Photos were wonderful.  Zoom brought you front and center. Auto-focus was wonderful.  Still photos and video looked professional.  Highly recommend this camera and accessories.

Reviews.Title: So far so good!
Reviews.Author: Zinsu Emmanuel
Reviews.Content: I just received my order today and looking at it I think it's a good product. I will recommend it

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon Coolpix P520 GPS Digital Camera (Dark Grey) + <2> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card + <3> Spare EN-EL5 Battery +
<4> Battery Charger for EN-EL5 + <5> PD-C15 Camera / Camcorder Case + <6> Zeikos 50" Compact Tripod +
<7> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <8> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <9> PD 5pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<10> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <11> Image Recovery Software + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon Coolpix P520 GPS Digital Camera (Dark Grey) with 32GB Card + Battery & Charger + Case + Tripod + HDMI Cable + Accessory Kit
